english: Exiles long to return to their native land .
chinese: 流亡者们渴望回到自己的祖国。

english: They called back their exiles and prepared for resistance .
chinese: 他们召回流亡在外的人，准备抵抗。

english: Mostly i gave english lessons to recently-arrived refugees .
chinese: 我主要给新来乍到的流亡人士补习英语。

english: He and his brother fled to the north to establish a new society .
chinese: 他和他弟弟流亡到北方开辟新家园。
流亡造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: There were many french exiles in england after the revolution .
chinese: 大革命后，在英国有许多法国流亡者。

english: In 1891 marie lived in paris among a group of polish exiles .
chinese: 1891年玛丽生活在巴黎的一群波兰流亡者中。

english: Not an emigrant he hoped within the sense and spirit of the law .
chinese: 他希望在法律的意义和精神上他并不是流亡者。

english: As he had grown extremely fond of london, he cursed the flatness of exile .
chinese: 由于他对伦敦已经产生了浑厚的感情，他诅咒这不可抗拒的流亡。

english: She shared their expatriation, their convictions, their pastimes, their ennui .
chinese: 她与他们有共同的流亡国外的命运，共同的信念，共同的乐趣，共同的苦闷。

english: The soviet émigré networks, undoubtedly the most penetrated of all, were rolled up .
chinese: 由苏联流亡分子组成的特务网无疑是被渗透的最厉害的特务网，但是也都收了摊子。

english: It was a period when the religious exiles were accustomed often to buckle on their armor, and practice the handling of their weapons of war .
chinese: 这还是宗教流亡者们惯常披甲戴盔演习武艺的时代。

english: It was reported to me that he was then a virtual exile in argentina, unable to go back to france because of the enmity of laval, hitler's most evil puppet .
chinese: 据说他正流亡在阿根廷，与希特勒的傀儡赖伐尔是对头，而不能回法国去。

english: 1917 lenin returned home from exile in switzerland
chinese: 列宁从瑞士流亡返回俄国。
